thread.title: Swansea City boss Garry Monk unconcerned by striker Andre Ayew to Liverpool transfer rumours
thread.title_full: Swansea City boss Garry Monk unconcerned by striker Andre Ayew to Liverpool transfer rumours

title: Swansea City boss Garry Monk unconcerned by striker Andre Ayew to Liverpool transfer rumours
text:
14:25 CET Swansea City boss Garry Monk unconcerned by striker Andre Ayew to Liverpool transfer rumours - www.ghanasoccernet.com Andre Ayew 
Swansea City manager Garry Monk is not concerned about transfer speculation linking star striker Andre Ayew with a move to Liverpool. 
The Ghana international, 25, is reportedly a top target for new Reds boss Jurgen Klopp and it has been speculated that the player himself is a fan of the Merseyside giants. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
